text: Doug Dersch (born April 18, 1946) was a Canadian football player who played for the Edmonton Eskimos, Montreal Alouettes, Hamilton Tiger-Cats and Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with Hamilton in 1972. He played college football at the University of Calgary.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=derscdou001 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Calgary Dinos football players Category:Canadian football linebackers Category:Edmonton Eskimos players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:People from Red Deer County Category:Players of Canadian football from Alberta
title: Doug Dersch
